Title: Valid email format registration
Steps: Enter a valid email address | Click 'Sign Up' button

Title: Invalid email format registration
Steps: Enter an invalid email address | Click 'Sign Up' button
Expected: Error message displayed and user not registered

Title: Short password registration
Steps: Enter a password less than 8 characters | Click 'Sign Up' button
Expected: Error message displayed and user not registered

Title: Password without uppercase letter
Steps: Enter a password without an uppercase letter | Click 'Sign Up' button
Expected: Error message displayed and user not registered

Title: Password without number
Steps: Enter a password without a number | Click 'Sign Up' button
Expected: Error message displayed and user not registered

Title: Password without special character
Steps: Enter a password without a special character | Click 'Sign Up' button
Expected: Error message displayed and user not registered

Title: Existing email registration
Steps: Enter an email address already in use | Click 'Sign Up' button
Expected: Error message displayed and user not registered

Title: OTP verification after signup
Steps: Register using a new email; mobile number; and password | Receive OTP on the provided mobile number | Enter the OTP and click 'Verify' button
Expected: User is successfully verified and redirected to welcome page
